thread.title: Arrest made in case of dog left abandoned outside LI clinic
thread.title_full: Arrest made in case of dog left abandoned outside LI clinic - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Arrest made in case of dog left abandoned outside LI clinic
text:
MINEOLA, N.Y. (AP) - Authorities say a woman depicted in a video allegedly abandoning a stolen dog outside a Hempstead, Long Island, veterinary clinic has been arrested.
The Nassau County district attorney's office says Tamara Copeland was arrested Thursday. A day earlier, the DA posted video requesting information about the case.
Copeland, who lives in Hempstead, was charged with misdemeanor animal neglect and animal abandonment.
She was represented at arraignment by an attorney from Legal Aid, which does not comment on pending cases.
The dog, a poodle-mix named Nino, was reported stolen more than a year ago. Its whereabouts was a mystery until it was found Tuesday mornings suffering from open wounds and was covered in bloody bandages
Nino and its original owner are expected to be reunited after it recovers.
